# GPsim: An R Package for Simulating Gaussian Processes

The R package `GPsim` is a simulation framework for generating realizations of both stationary and nonstationary Gaussian Processes (GPs), which allows users to make use of a wide range of simulation designs including arbitrary domains and user-defined covariance models. This R package is NOT available now.


## Installation

```{install}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("myeongjong/GPsim")
```
